account.keep_this_token_secure_it_provides_full_: üîê Keep this token secure! It provides full access to your account.
account.are_you_sure_you_want_to_permanently_del: Are you sure you want to permanently delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
account.any_secrets_you_wish_to_remove: Any secrets you wish to remove,
account.secrets_will_remain_active_until_they_ex: Secrets will remain active until they expire.
account.are_you_sure_you_want_to_deactivate_your: Are you sure you want to deactivate your account? All of your data will be permanently removed from our servers forever. This action cannot be undone.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account settings and preferences
settings.manage_your_account_settings_and_prefere: Manage your account settings and preferences

profile.title: Profile
profile.password_required_for_security: Your password is required for security purposes
profile.verification_email_notice: A verification email will be sent to the new address
profile.change_email_description: Update the email address associated with your account
profile.invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address
profile.email_same_as_current: New email must be different from current email
profile.email_change_success: Email updated successfully. Please check your inbox to verify your new email address.
profile.email_change_error: Failed to update email. Please try again.

delete_account.title: Delete Account
delete_account.description: Permanently delete your account and all data
delete_account.permanently_delete_your_account: Permanently delete your account and all data

security.enable_mfa_recommendation: Enable two-factor authentication for stronger protection
security.generate_recovery_codes_recommendation: Generate recovery codes as a backup
security.use_strong_unique_password: Use a strong, unique password for your account
security.enable_mfa_for_protection: Enable two-factor authentication for additional protection
security.save_recovery_codes_safely: Save your recovery codes in a secure location
security.review_sessions_regularly: Review and revoke unused sessions regularly

api.title: API & Integrations
api.documentation_description: Learn how to integrate Onetime Secret into your applications
api.never_commit_api_keys: Never commit API keys to version control
api.use_environment_variables: Use environment variables to store API keys
api.rotate_keys_regularly: Rotate API keys regularly for security
api.use_https_only: Always use HTTPS when making API requests
api.monitor_api_usage: Monitor your API usage and set up alerts
api.regenerating_key_warning: Regenerating your API key will invalidate the current key. Update all applications using the old key.

privacy.title: Privacy Settings
privacy.explanation: This isn't a setting because there's nothing to turn on or off. Your privacy is built into how we operate.

notifications.title: Notification Settings
notifications.error_updating: Failed to update notification preference. Please try again.

reveal_notifications.title: Secret Reveal Notifications
reveal_notifications.description: Receive an email when someone views your secret
reveal_notifications.help: You'll be notified each time a recipient reveals one of your secrets

notifications.privacy_note: Notification emails include only the timestamp and secret ID. Viewer information is never included.

caution.title: Careful Consideration Zone
caution.export_description: Request a complete copy of your account data in machine-readable format
caution.export_info_description: Exports are processed within 24 hours and sent to your email address
caution.deletion_warning_metadata: Remove all secret metadata and history
